statements: SELECT * FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data_table;
SELECT longitude, location_name, id FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT id, location_name FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE longitude < -100;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data_table ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT id, location_name FROM geospatial_data_table WHERE location_name LIKE '%City%';
SELECT id, location_name FROM geospatial_data_table ORDER BY location_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(latitude) AS avg_latitude, AVG(longitude) AS avg_longitude FROM geospatial_data_table;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT location FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE name LIKE '%A%' ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE location IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE location IS NULL ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE location = ST_GeomFromText('POINT(10 20)');
SELECT u.user_id, l.name FROM users u JOIN locations l ON u.location = l.coordinates ORDER BY l.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT address, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT analysis_id, result FROM spatial_analysis WHERE analysis_type = 'heatmap';
SELECT analysis_type, result FROM spatial_analysis WHERE data_id IN (SELECT data_id FROM geospatial_data WHERE data_type = 'temperature');
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100 ORDER BY location_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40.0 AND longitude < -100.0
SELECT location_id, address FROM locations WHERE location_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY location_id DESC
SELECT l.location_id, g.data_type, s.analysis_type FROM locations l JOIN geospatial_data g ON l.location_id = g.location_id JOIN spatial_analysis s ON g.data_id = s.data_id
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY location_id ASC
SELECT l.location_id, l.latitude, l.longitude, g.data_value->>'title' AS title FROM locations l JOIN geospatial_data g ON l.location_id = g.location_id WHERE l.latitude < 35.0
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_id, check_in_timestamp FROM user_locations WHERE check_in_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT id, username, email FROM user ORDER BY username COLLATE "C";
SELECT * FROM geospatial_data ORDER BY created_at DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM geospatial_data WHERE latitude > 10 AND longitude < 20 ORDER BY id;

SELECT u.username, g.location_name, ul.check_in_timestamp FROM user u JOIN user_locations ul ON u.id = ul.user_id JOIN geospatial_data g ON ul.location_id = g.id WHERE u.username LIKE 'j%' ORDER BY ul.check_in_timestamp DESC;
SELECT analysis_name, result FROM spatial_analysis ORDER BY analysis_id DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT u.username, u.email, g.location_name, g.created_at FROM user u JOIN user_locations ul ON u.id = ul.user_id JOIN geospatial_data g ON ul.location_id = g.id WHERE u.email LIKE '%@example.com' ORDER BY g.created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM users
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations
SELECT route_name, distance FROM routes
SELECT result_id, analysis_date, result_text FROM analysis_results
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT route_name, distance, start_location_id, end_location_id FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance ASC;
SELECT result_id, route_id, analysis_date FROM analysis_results WHERE analysis_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT name, area FROM geofences WHERE area < 1000;
